be.ac.umons.controller

Class Controller<T extends Game>

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.controller.Controller<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Game instance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomaticController, BasicGameController, EditorController

    public abstract class Controller<T extends Game>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to handle interaction with the user.

        protected boolean isGoodSource(Pos mouseCell,
                               boolean bot)
        Checks if the element at the mouseCell position cn be used as source of a Drag and Drop move
        Parameters:
        mouseCell - The Cell
        bot - True if the Cell belongs to a Container
        Returns:
        whether the element at the mouseCell position cn be used as source of a Drag and Drop move

                              boolean isBot)
        Prepares the Payload with the source Cell data
        Parameters:
        payload - Payload to be prepared
        rend - MapRenderer corresponding to the object containing the source cell
        mouseCell - Source Cell
        isBot - True if the source cell belongs to a Container
